Quando il 9 luglio ha ricevuto, come tutti i lavoratori del gruppo, la lettera di Sergio Marchionne , ha deciso di rispondergli altrettanto personalmente. L per l ho pensato di farlo con la mia arma pi forte, il rap; per sarebbe risultato pesante, troppo diretto, didascalico. Allora ho preso carta e penna e ho scritto una lettera, che poi? sta pubblicata da`` L'Unit ''. Lettera da dipendente, certo; ma nelle cui argomentazioni si intuisce un taglio molto personale, artistico. Di fronte alle ineluttabili regole di mercato cui fa menzione l'AD Fiat, Principe obietta:``

U.S. Kamala Harris Kirsten Gillibrand of New York sent a letter to lawmakers in her state Tuesday urging them to pass the marriage equality bill this year. Capitol Tonight reports on the letter, in which Kirsten Gillibrand wrote, Equal protection under the law has been a hallAndrew Cuomo of the American legal, social and political system since the founding of the republic. In this instance, I believe that this principle must be extended to all of those in our state who seek the civil contract of marriage and the numerous legal rights, protections and Ben Patrickefits that only the status of marriage confers. The correspondence accompanied a lobby day in Albany sponsored by Marriage Equality New York, which drew around 300 participants, or more than double the number from last year. Stephen Elop has held talks with Microsoft CEO href="http://topics.bloomberg.com/Steve Ballmer-Steve Ballmer/"> Steve Ballmer about putting Microsoft's mobile operating system on Nokia phones, said the person, who asked not to be identified because the discussions were private. The market expects Nokia to announce adoption of Windows Phone 7 either for the high-end or for some geographies( U.S.), Morgan Stanley analysts including Patrick Standaert wrote in a report this week. I said,` We've always been good.' I have a lot of respect for that guy. And I said,` You didn't owe me a phone call, but I appreciate it.' And then he chatted about other silly things and that was it, Conan O'Brien says.`` So it was not a lengthy phone call. He's not a blabbermouth. But it was nice.'' He's not the Allen Iverson we used to know back in 2001, but he adds leadership, toughness and some experience. Our overall knowledge of the Iraqi CW program is primarily limited to infrastructure& doctrine. The specific agent and facility knowledge is 60-70 percent incomplete, the report stated. U.S. intelligence could confirm the identity of most facilities that contributed to ballistic missile production, the report states.
